attributes.action: College transport fees should be reduced for young people attending further education
attributes.additional_details: This is a campaign to reduce the cost of transport to and from college/sixth form. Prices are between £450 and £800 per academic year. Students choosing to go into further education: full-time and part-time, struggle to pay the price to get there. This could lead to debt and financial problems at a very young age. Please sign this petition if you agree
